articles.title: Covid-19 in SA: 520 more die, as 17 351 get infected with virus By IOL - IOL
articles.description: Over 520 more people have succumbed to the coronavirus in South Africa, while over 17 351 more people were infected with the virus.
articles.content:
Johannesburg - Over 520 more people have succumbed to the coronavirus in South Africa, while over 17 351 more people were infected with the virus.
